name: Central Park
description: A large public park in New York City, known for its expansive green spaces and cultural landmarks.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: An iconic iron tower located in the heart of Paris, offering stunning views of the city.

name: Tokyo Tower
description: A red and white communications tower inspired by the Eiffel Tower, with observation decks.

name: Colosseum
description: An ancient amphitheater in Rome, famous for its history and grand architectural design.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: A world-famous performing arts center with a distinctive sail-like design, located on Sydney Harbor.

name: Great Wall of China
description: An ancient series of walls and fortifications, spanning across northern China.

name: Machu Picchu
description: A 15th-century Inca citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, known for its archaeological significance.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: A large statue of Jesus Christ located atop Mount Corcovado, overlooking Rio de Janeiro.

name: Santorini
description: A picturesque island known for its whitewashed buildings with blue domes, and beautiful sunsets.

name: Grand Canyon
description: A massive canyon known for its size, unique geologic features, and scenic views.
